articles.description: Tennessee receiver Jalin Hyatt has announced he will enter the 2023 NFL draft and skip the Vols' Orange Bowl matchup against Clemson.
articles.content:
Tennessee junior wide receiver Jalin Hyatt announced Wednesday he'll enter the 2023 NFL draft.
Hyatt is ESPN's 44th overall (No. 7 WR) prospect available, and he will skip the Capital One Orange Bow… [+773 chars]
